title: General
fullText:
A switchboard or switchboards shall be provided in or on the recreational vehicle or non-recreational vehicle for the mounting or the enclosure of switchgear and protective devices in accordance with this section.
Switchboards installed externally shall be a minimum of IP55.
A label shall be installed, on or adjacent to the switchboard, identifying all wiring systems located within the connectable electrical installation. For example:
WARNING â€” This installation contains low voltage (230 V), extra low voltage and automotive wiring systems. Refer to the owner's manual.
